monitor_info.description: Monitors for disclosure of sensitive information using LLM analysis

monitor_info.description: Monitors for agents taking excessive or unauthorized actions using LLM analysis

monitor_info.name: CodeExecutionMonitor
monitor_info.description: Monitors for unauthorized code execution attempts using LLM analysis

monitor_info.name: HallucinationMonitor
monitor_info.description: Monitors for fabricated or inconsistent information using LLM analysis

monitor_info.name: MemoryPoisoningMonitor
monitor_info.description: Monitors for attempts to poison agent memory or context using LLM analysis

monitor_info.name: ToolMisuseMonitor
monitor_info.description: Monitors for misuse of available tools using LLM analysis

monitor_info.name: MessageTamperingMonitor
monitor_info.description: Monitors for message tampering and content injection using LLM analysis

monitor_info.description: Monitors for malicious content spreading between agents using LLM analysis

monitor_info.description: Monitors for misinformation amplification using LLM analysis

monitor_info.description: Monitors for insecure output patterns using LLM analysis

monitor_info.description: Monitors for goal drift and objective changes using LLM analysis
